talk: When I was designing this shoe I felt like for the first time I was doing what i liked and was passionate about. Though these pairs are costly they are designed in a way that it is not easy for them to get torn by accident, some one else or by water.The are also available in nice colors depending on your preferences.
name: Ben Cambell
